name: Adidas Runners Easy Run
about: A relaxed, low-intensity run focused on comfort and conversation. Ideal for active recovery, building aerobic endurance, or simply enjoying the movement without pressure. Suitable for all levels—come as you are and run at your own pace.

name: Adidas Runners Back to Basics -Beginners Special
about: Join the adidas Runners community for a friendly, supportive run designed especially for beginners. Whether lacing up for the first time or getting back into a routine, this session focuses on proper form, pacing, and building confidence. Led by experienced coaches, it's the perfect way to start your running journey in a fun and motivating environment. All fitness levels welcome—no one gets left behind!

name: Adidas Runners Back To Basics - Beginner Special
about: Join the adidas Runners community for a friendly, supportive run designed especially for beginners. Whether you're lacing up for the first time or getting back into a routine, this session focuses on proper form, pacing, and building confidence. Led by experienced coaches, it's the perfect way to start your running journey in a fun and motivating environment. All fitness levels welcome—no one gets left behind!

name: Adidas Runners Aerobic Run & Stretching
about: Boost your endurance with a steady-paced aerobic run, designed to improve cardiovascular fitness while keeping things comfortable and conversational. We'll finish with a guided full-body stretch to aid recovery, improve flexibility, and keep you feeling strong. Perfect for building consistency and preventing injuries.
